sentences.english: You've got mixed up by the use of participle and gerund.
sentences.chinese: 你混淆了現在分詞和動名詞的用法。

sentences.english: In english grammar the gerund have exactly the same form as the present participle.
sentences.chinese: 英語文法中，動名詞具有與現在分詞完全一樣的形式。

sentences.english: In english grammar the gerund has exactly the same form as the present participle.
sentences.chinese: 英語語法中，動名詞具有與現在分詞完全一樣的形式。

sentences.english: Voice is a property of clauses, and infinitives and gerunds form phrases.
sentences.chinese: 語態是從句的屬性，不定式和動名詞構成短語。

sentences.english: The gerund must not be confused with the present participle.
sentences.chinese: 動名詞不應與現在分詞混淆。

sentences.english: There can be a difference in meaning when the infinitive or the gerund is used after some verbs.
sentences.chinese: 某些動詞後用不定式或動名詞時，意思有不同。

sentences.english: Pick out the participles or gerunds in the following sentences and give their functions.
sentences.chinese: 區別下列句子中的分詞和動名詞，並說明它們的作用。

sentences.english: I have trouble telling the difference between a gerund and a participle.
sentences.chinese: 動名詞和分詞的區別，我分不出來。

sentences.english: Gerund is an important part of English grammar in English teaching.
sentences.chinese: 動名詞是英語教學中一項重要語法內容。
